RemediationStrings.Title: The built-in guest account is enabled
RemediationStrings.Description: To comply with Cyber Essentials the built-in guest account must be disabled.

RemediationStrings.Title: Autoplay for all drives in enabled
RemediationStrings.Description: To comply with Cyber Essentials Autoplay for all devices must be disabled.

RemediationStrings.Description: To comply with Cyber Essentials your device must be protected by an antivirus solution.

RemediationStrings.Description: To comply with Cyber Essentials your device must be protected by an up-to-date antivirus solution.

RemediationStrings.Title: ZoneAlarm NextGen Firewall is disabled
RemediationStrings.Description: To comply with Cyber Essentials all network profiles firewalls must be enabled.

RemediationStrings.Title: Windows operating system is out of date
RemediationStrings.Description: To comply with Cyber Essentials your device must have the latest updates installed.
